lead_paragraph: Andre Drummond had 18 points and 15 rebounds, Kentavious Caldwell-Pope added 22 points and the Detroit Pistons beat the Miami Heat 107-84 on Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: Pistons Rout Heat 107-84 to End Four-Game Skid
headline.main: Pistons Rout Heat 107-84 to End Four-Game Skid

snippet: Andre Drummond had 18 points and 15 rebounds, Kentavious Caldwell-Pope added 22 points and the Detroit Pistons beat the Miami Heat 107-84 on Wednesday night....
